papers.title: Accelerators for Quantum Technologies
papers.abstract: Dr. A. Romanenko will present "SRF-based accelerator technologies for Quantum" followed by "Large Ion Traps for Quantum Information Systems" presented by Dr. K. Brown. "Examples of AI/ML enabled by HPCs in design applied to a QIS" presentation by Dr. S. Sosa will be followed by panel discussion and audience questions.
